oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medals; Centennial celebrations
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.); United States Mint
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Souvenir medallion produced by the United States Mint to commemorate the Tennessee Centennial Exposition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition Collection, 1895-1900
